column4: Hello! I have Ubuntu 9.04 and i installed Wine to get µTorrent. I made µTorrent the standard .torrent application in firefox, but everytime i download a torrent uTorrent give me an error: "unable to load path: tmp/file name" HELP HELP?
why utorrent in wine? Not a native app?
there are many torrent apps in the ubuntu repos
yes and i am using kTorrent, but i would like to use µTorrent cause it is my favorite app 4 torrents
